effects.name: Clear Sound
effects.description: Plays the classic line clear sound effect

effects.name: Scale Distortion
effects.description: The game interface randomly scales up and down

effects.name: Rotation Chaos
effects.description: The entire game rotates at random angles

effects.name: Skew Transform
effects.description: Elements become skewed and distorted

effects.name: Glitch Text
effects.description: Text elements flash with rainbow colors

effects.name: Glitch Borders
effects.description: UI borders flash with chaotic colors

effects.name: Element Rotation
effects.description: UI elements spin continuously

effects.name: Zoom Effect
effects.description: Elements zoom in and out rhythmically

effects.name: Wave Effect
effects.description: Text bounces up and down like waves

effects.name: Piece Mutation
effects.description: Tetris pieces randomly change shape

effects.name: Color Cycling
effects.description: Block colors shift and change randomly

effects.name: Piece Lock
effects.description: Forces the same piece type repeatedly

effects.name: Board Chaos
effects.description: Random blocks appear and disappear on the board

effects.name: Turkey Sandwich
effects.description: A mysterious turkey sandwich video appears

effects.name: Subway Surfers
effects.description: Brain rot gaming content takes over half the screen

effects.name: Audio Distortion
effects.description: Sound effects become distorted and chaotic

effects.name: Screen Flash
effects.description: The screen flashes with random bright colors

effects.name: Corner Lights
effects.description: Random lights appear in the corners of the screen

effects.name: Hold Piece Swap
effects.description: Current and hold pieces randomly swap places

effects.name: Speed Chaos
effects.description: Game speed randomly increases and decreases

effects.name: Inverted Controls
effects.description: Movement controls become inverted
